item.title: re-start blog
item.description:
Trying out cryogen

After a lapse of a few years, now trying to get my notes updated with my new flavour of programming language - clojure. So trying out the static blog cyrogen can help me get my notes up to date.

Lets see

Gas.
item.author: Andrés Gasson
